TypeSignature.Value: public interface IEmailSender<TUser> where TUser : class
.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IEmailSender`1<class TUser>

Docs.summary: This API supports the ASP.NET Core Identity infrastructure and is not intended to be used as a general purpose email abstraction. It should be implemented by the application so the Identity infrastructure can send confirmation and password reset emails.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task SendConfirmationLinkAsync (TUser user, string email, string confirmationLink);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task SendConfirmationLinkAsync(!TUser user, string email, string confirmationLink) cil managed
Public Function SendConfirmationLinkAsync (user As TUser, email As String, confirmationLink As String) As Task
abstract member SendConfirmationLinkAsync : 'User * string * string -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.param: The user that is attempting to confirm their email.
The link to follow to confirm a user's email. Do not double encode this.
Docs.summary: This API supports the ASP.NET Core Identity infrastructure and is not intended to be used as a general purpose email abstraction. It should be implemented by the application so the Identity infrastructure can send confirmation emails.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task SendPasswordResetCodeAsync (TUser user, string email, string resetCode);

Docs.param: The user that is attempting to reset their password.
The code to use to reset the user password. Do not double encode this.
Docs.summary: This API supports the ASP.NET Core Identity infrastructure and is not intended to be used as a general purpose email abstraction. It should be implemented by the application so the Identity infrastructure can send password reset emails.

Docs.summary: This API supports the ASP.NET Core Identity infrastructure and is not intended to be used as a general purpose email abstraction. It should be implemented by the application so the Identity infrastructure can send password reset emails.
